metadata.title: CVE-2021-3753 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
A race problem was seen in the vt_k_ioctl in drivers/tty/vt/vt_ioctl.c inthe Linux kernel, which may cause an out of bounds read in vt as the writeaccess to vc_mode is not protected by lock-in vt_ioctl (KDSETMDE). Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3753` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1007-azure - 6.8.0-1007.7
No subscription required

No subscription required
